task.title: Locating the client workspace
task.shortdesc: Both HCL Sametime Connect and HCL Notes store user-specific data, including configuration data, preferences, and trace logs, in a workspace folder on the user's local hard drive or a network drive. To diagnose client issues, you might ask users to update or collect files in their workspace. Provide the information in this topic to users to help them locate their workspace.

context.p: The workspace location varies depending on a number of factors, including the type of client, the operating system, and the product release.

p.b: Location of Sametime Client workspace by Operating System

ul.li:
Sametime Embedded Client (single user install path)
C:\Program Files\HCL\Notes\Data\workspace

Sametime Embedded Client (multi user install path)
C:\users\user_name\AppData\Local\HCL\Notes\Data\workspace

p.b: Mac OS (use keyboard combination "Cmd+Shift+Dot" to show hidden folders)

ul.li:
Sametime Connect Client
/Users/user_name/Library/Application Support/HCL Sametime Data

Sametime Embedded Client
/Users/user_name/Library/Application Support/HCL Notes Data/Expeditor/Applications

context.p: For more information, see the topics on Notes installation directories in the Domino Administration documentation.
